author: Maangchi
description: Super-spicy chicken tempered with loads of cheese and fresh spring onions. Serve with rice and a light salad – or, better yet, an assortment of side dishes.
title: Cheese Buldak

author: 하루한끼
description: Perilla leaves, stuffed with a pork-based filling, then eggwashed and fried.
title: Pan-Fried Perilla Leaves

author: Lutz Geißler (Plötzblog)
description: A coarse-textured wheat sourdough bread based on the principles of one of the most famous breads in the USA.
title: San Francisco Sourdough Bread

description: Great on a hot summer day.
title: Strawberry Smoothie

description: A pretty basic, but vegan, chocolate cake, easily customizable with nuts (not bolts) or berries.
title: Vegan Chocolate Cake
